name: MD Daily Digest (Test)

on:
  # ✅ 매일 오전 8:30 KST (= UTC 23:30)
  schedule:
    - cron: "30 23 * * *"
  # ✅ 수동 실행 버튼
  workflow_dispatch:

jobs:
  md-daily:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v5
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          pip install pandas google-cloud-bigquery google-auth

      - name: Run MD Daily Digest
        env:
          # ---- GCP / BigQuery ----
          GCP_SA_JSON: ${{ secrets.GCP_SA_JSON }}
          BQ_PROJECT: columbia-ga4
          BQ_DATASET: mart

          # ---- Mail ----
          SMTP_PROVIDER: outlook
          SMTP_USER: ${{ secrets.SMTP_USER }}
          SMTP_PASS: ${{ secrets.SMTP_PASS }}

          # ✅ 테스트용: 환경변수 없으면 hugh.kang@columbia.com 으로만 발송됨
          # MD_DAILY_RECIPIENTS: hugh.kang@columbia.com

        run: |
          python md_daily_digest.py
